alert.note: Alert for Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 4:55PM CDT until July 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SIOUX COUNTY... At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hull, or 7 miles northeast of Sioux Center, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 4:48 pm, ping pong ball sized hailed and 50-60 mph winds were reported near hull. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Boyden around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hospers, Matlock and Sheldon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
